Text.val: 04.02.2013 SH SCR17678 I/O properties: Changed CharSet = UTF-8 back to Ansi
05.04.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
06.10.2009 MKO SCR14932 change report "SQL bank" to OLE mechanism

SQL_STMT_U.val: select debp_debh_no , strip ( replace ( replace ( replace ( replace ( replace ( replace ( REPLACE (debp_tel , ' ' ,'' ) , '/' , '') , '-' , '') , '(' , '' ) , ')' , '') , '+' , '') , '!' ,'' ) , l , '0' ) as tel from :1/debp , :1/debc where debp_tel > ' ' and debp_debh_no = debc_debh and debc_admno = :2 and debc_clntno = :3 and DEBC_DATDELETED IS NULL union select debh_no , strip ( replace ( replace ( replace ( replace ( replace ( replace ( REPLACE (debh_tel , ' ' ,'' ) , '/' , '') , '-' , '') , '(' , '' ) , ')' , '') , '+' , '') , '!' ,'' ) , l , '0' ) as tel from :1/debh , :1/debc where debh_tel > ' ' and debh_no = debc_debh and debc_admno = :2 and debc_clntno = :3 and DEBC_DATDELETED IS NULL ORDER BY TEL ;

select DISTINCT DCBA_LASTRECVPAYBANKACCOUNT , debc_debh from :1/dcba , :1/debc where DCBA_ADMNO = :2 and DCBA_CLNTNO = :3 and dcba_debc_no = debc_no and DEBC_DATDELETED is NULL and CHARACTER_LENGTH ( rtrim ( ltrim (DCBA_LASTRECVPAYBANKACCOUNT) ) ) > 10 order by DCBA_LASTRECVPAYBANKACCOUNT ;

select DISTINCT DCBA_LASTRECVPAYBANKACCOUNT , debc_debh from :1/dcba , :1/debc where DCBA_ADMNO = :2 and DCBA_CLNTNO = :3 and dcba_debc_no = debc_no and DEBC_DATDELETED is NULL and CHARACTER_LENGTH ( rtrim ( ltrim (DCBA_LASTRECVPAYBANKACCOUNT) ) ) > 10 order by DCBA_LASTRECVPAYBANKACCOUNT ;
